channel.title: Blog on Jenkins X
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Jenkins X

item.title: Introducing Jenkins X
item.description: Introducing Jenkins X There’s a new blog post on jenkins.io which introduces Jenkins X and gives an overview of what it, what we’re doing and why: Introducing Jenkins X: a CI/CD solution for modern cloud applications on Kubernetes Please check it out and let us know what you think

item.title: JEP 400 submitted
item.description: JEP 400 Submitted for Jenkins X We have submitted JEP 400 to propose Jenkins X as a sub project in the Jenkins Foundation. Please check out JEP 400 and let us know what you think on the Jenkins dev list.
